string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: About Frieren adventure after her hero party defeat the demon lord.
A tragedy in which the Elrich brotherhood try to revive their own mother
A mad scientist, Okabe Rintaro wants to make a time machine
Gintoki, Shinpachi, and Kagura comedic daily life
Humanity must survive againts giants called titans
Gon Freecss wants to be a Hunter in search for his father.
Adventure of soul reaper in hunting monster called hollows.
Kaguya loves Shirogane. But for some reason, she is too shy to confess
Tells about a group of teenager which own zodiac spirit
Tomoya Okazaki and Nagisa Furukawa wants to get married
